title: Download VSO Drop and Run Script
description: Downloads the latest build artifact for a given build definition and then executes a script from that drop

VsoProjectUri.description: The URL for the VSO project that contains the build, eg https://accountName.visualstudio.com/defaultcollection/projectName

buildDefinitionName.description: Name of the build definition to be retrieved

PersonalAccessToken.description: Personal Access Token for accessing VSO build

pathToScript.description: Path to Script for execution, eg 'drop\bin\Debug\scriptName.ps1'

runCommand.commandToExecute: [concat('powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy bypass -File DownloadVsoDropAndExecuteScript.ps1', ' -accessToken ', parameters('PersonalAccessToken'), ' -buildDefinitionName ', parameters('buildDefinitionName'), ' -VsoProjectUri ', parameters('VsoProjectUri'), ' -pathToScript ', parameters('pathToScript'))]
